Uses of Interface
org.apache.taverna.server.master.interfaces.LocalIdentityMapper

  • Packages that use LocalIdentityMapper 
    Package Description
    org.apache.taverna.server.master
    The core of the implementation of Taverna Server, including the implementations of the SOAP and REST interfaces.
    org.apache.taverna.server.master.identity
    Implementations of beans that map global user identities to local usernames.
    org.apache.taverna.server.master.localworker
    Implementation of a Taverna Server back-end that works by forking off workflow executors on the local system.

    • Uses of LocalIdentityMapper in org.apache.taverna.server.master

    • Uses of LocalIdentityMapper in org.apache.taverna.server.master.identity

      Classes in org.apache.taverna.server.master.identity that implement LocalIdentityMapper 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AuthorityDerivedIDMapper
      Extracts the local user id from the set of Spring Security authorities granted to the current user.
      class  CompositeIDMapper
      An identity mapper that composes the results from other mappers, using the identity mappers in order until one can provide a non-null answer.
      class  ConstantIDMapper
      A trivial principal to user mapper that always uses the same ID.
      class  NameIDMapper
      A trivial identity mapper that just uses the name out of the Principal, or uses a regular expression to extract it from the string representation of the principal.
      static class  WorkflowInternalAuthProvider.WorkflowSelfIDMapper 
      Method parameters in org.apache.taverna.server.master.identity with type arguments of type LocalIdentityMapper 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
